49typedef struct {
50 uint32_t counter;
51 uint32_t set_tim_counter_cnt;
52} FuriHalRfidField;

54typedef struct {
55 FuriHalRfidDMACallback dma_callback;
56 FuriHalRfidReadCaptureCallback read_capture_callback;
57 void* context;
58 FuriHalRfidField field;
59} FuriHalRfid;

61FuriHalRfid* furi_hal_rfid = NULL;

63#define LFRFID_LL_READ_TIM TIM1
64#define LFRFID_LL_READ_CONFIG_CHANNEL LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1
65#define LFRFID_LL_READ_CHANNEL LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1N

70void furi_hal_rfid_init() {
71 furi_assert(furi_hal_rfid == NULL);
72 furi_hal_rfid = malloc(sizeof(FuriHalRfid));
73 furi_hal_rfid->field.counter = 0;
74 furi_hal_rfid->field.set_tim_counter_cnt = 0;
75
76 furi_hal_rfid_pins_reset();
77
78 LL_COMP_InitTypeDef COMP_InitStruct = {0};
79 COMP_InitStruct.PowerMode = LL_COMP_POWERMODE_MEDIUMSPEED;
80 COMP_InitStruct.InputPlus = LL_COMP_INPUT_PLUS_IO1;
81 COMP_InitStruct.InputMinus = LL_COMP_INPUT_MINUS_1_2VREFINT;
82 COMP_InitStruct.InputHysteresis = LL_COMP_HYSTERESIS_HIGH;
83 COMP_InitStruct.OutputPolarity = LL_COMP_OUTPUTPOL_NONINVERTED;
84 COMP_InitStruct.OutputBlankingSource = LL_COMP_BLANKINGSRC_NONE;
85 LL_COMP_Init(COMP1, &COMP_InitStruct);
86 LL_COMP_SetCommonWindowMode(__LL_COMP_COMMON_INSTANCE(COMP1), LL_COMP_WINDOWMODE_DISABLE);
87
88 LL_EXTI_ClearFlag_0_31(LL_EXTI_LINE_20);
89 LL_EXTI_EnableFallingTrig_0_31(LL_EXTI_LINE_20);
90 LL_EXTI_EnableRisingTrig_0_31(LL_EXTI_LINE_20);
91 LL_EXTI_DisableEvent_0_31(LL_EXTI_LINE_20);
92 LL_EXTI_EnableIT_0_31(LL_EXTI_LINE_20);
93
94 NVIC_SetPriority(COMP_IRQn, NVIC_EncodePriority(NVIC_GetPriorityGrouping(), 5, 0));
95 NVIC_EnableIRQ(COMP_IRQn);
96}
97
98void furi_hal_rfid_pins_reset() {
99 // ibutton bus disable
100 furi_hal_ibutton_pin_reset();
101
102 // pulldown rfid antenna
103 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_rfid_carrier_out, GpioModeOutputPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
104 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_rfid_carrier_out, false);
105
106 // from both sides
107 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull, GpioModeOutputPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
108 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull, true);
109
110 furi_hal_gpio_init_simple(&gpio_rfid_carrier, GpioModeAnalog);
111
112 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_rfid_data_in, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
113}
114
115static void furi_hal_rfid_pins_emulate() {
116 // ibutton low
117 furi_hal_ibutton_pin_configure();
118 furi_hal_ibutton_pin_write(false);
119
120 // pull pin to timer out
121 furi_hal_gpio_init_ex(
122 &gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull,
123 GpioModeAltFunctionPushPull,
124 GpioPullNo,
125 GpioSpeedLow,
126 GpioAltFn1TIM2);
127
128 // pull rfid antenna from carrier side
129 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_rfid_carrier_out, GpioModeOutputPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
130 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_rfid_carrier_out, false);
131
132 furi_hal_gpio_init_ex(
133 &gpio_rfid_carrier, GpioModeAltFunctionPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow, GpioAltFn2TIM2);
134}
135
136static void furi_hal_rfid_pins_read() {
137 // ibutton low
138 furi_hal_ibutton_pin_configure();
139 furi_hal_ibutton_pin_write(false);
140
141 // dont pull rfid antenna
142 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull, GpioModeOutputPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
143 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull, false);
144
145 // carrier pin to timer out
146 furi_hal_gpio_init_ex(
147 &gpio_rfid_carrier_out,
148 GpioModeAltFunctionPushPull,
149 GpioPullNo,
150 GpioSpeedLow,
151 GpioAltFn1TIM1);
152
153 // comparator in
154 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_rfid_data_in, GpioModeAnalog, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
155}
156
157static void furi_hal_rfid_pins_field() {
158 // ibutton low
159 furi_hal_ibutton_pin_configure();
160 furi_hal_ibutton_pin_write(false);
161
162 // pull pin to timer out
163 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull, GpioModeOutputPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
164 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull, false);
165
166 // pull rfid antenna from carrier side
167 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_rfid_carrier_out, GpioModeOutputPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow);
168 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_rfid_carrier_out, false);
169
170 furi_hal_gpio_init_ex(
171 &gpio_rfid_carrier, GpioModeAltFunctionPushPull, GpioPullNo, GpioSpeedLow, GpioAltFn2TIM2);
172}
173
174void furi_hal_rfid_pin_pull_release() {
175 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull, true);
176}
177
178void furi_hal_rfid_pin_pull_pulldown() {
179 furi_hal_gpio_write(&gpio_nfc_irq_rfid_pull, false);
180}
181
182void furi_hal_rfid_tim_read_start(float freq, float duty_cycle) {
183 furi_hal_bus_enable(FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER_BUS);
184
185 furi_hal_rfid_pins_read();
186
187 LL_TIM_InitTypeDef TIM_InitStruct = {0};
188 TIM_InitStruct.Autoreload = (SystemCoreClock / freq) - 1;
189 LL_TIM_Init(FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER, &TIM_InitStruct);
190 LL_TIM_DisableARRPreload(FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER);
191
192 LL_TIM_OC_InitTypeDef TIM_OC_InitStruct = {0};
193 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCMode = LL_TIM_OCMODE_PWM1;
194 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCNState = LL_TIM_OCSTATE_ENABLE;
195 TIM_OC_InitStruct.CompareValue = TIM_InitStruct.Autoreload * duty_cycle;
196 LL_TIM_OC_Init(
197 FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER, FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER_CHANNEL_CONFIG, &TIM_OC_InitStruct);
198
199 LL_TIM_EnableCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER);
200
201 furi_hal_rfid_tim_read_continue();
202}
203
204void furi_hal_rfid_tim_read_continue() {
205 LL_TIM_EnableAllOutputs(FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER);
206}
207
208void furi_hal_rfid_tim_read_pause() {
209 LL_TIM_DisableAllOutputs(FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER);
210}
211
212void furi_hal_rfid_tim_read_stop() {
213 furi_hal_bus_disable(FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER_BUS);
214}
215
216static void furi_hal_rfid_tim_emulate() {
217 LL_TIM_SetPrescaler(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER, 0);
218 LL_TIM_SetCounterMode(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER, LL_TIM_COUNTERMODE_UP);
219 LL_TIM_SetAutoReload(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER, 1);
220 LL_TIM_DisableARRPreload(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER);
221 LL_TIM_SetRepetitionCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER, 0);
222
223 LL_TIM_SetClockDivision(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER, LL_TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV1);
224 LL_TIM_SetClockSource(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER, LL_TIM_CLOCKSOURCE_EXT_MODE2);
225 LL_TIM_ConfigETR(
226 FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER,
227 LL_TIM_ETR_POLARITY_INVERTED,
228 LL_TIM_ETR_PRESCALER_DIV1,
229 LL_TIM_ETR_FILTER_FDIV1);
230
231 LL_TIM_OC_InitTypeDef TIM_OC_InitStruct = {0};
232 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCMode = LL_TIM_OCMODE_PWM1;
233 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCState = LL_TIM_OCSTATE_ENABLE;
234 TIM_OC_InitStruct.CompareValue = 1;
235 LL_TIM_OC_Init(
236 FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER, FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER_CHANNEL, &TIM_OC_InitStruct);
237
238 LL_TIM_GenerateEvent_UPDATE(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER);
239}
240
241static void furi_hal_capture_dma_isr(void* context) {
242 UNUSED(context);
243
244 // Channel 3, positive level
245 if(LL_TIM_IsActiveFlag_CC3(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM)) {
246 LL_TIM_ClearFlag_CC3(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM);
247 furi_hal_rfid->read_capture_callback(
248 true, LL_TIM_IC_GetCaptureCH3(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM), furi_hal_rfid->context);
249 }
250
251 // Channel 4, overall level
252 if(LL_TIM_IsActiveFlag_CC4(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM)) {
253 LL_TIM_ClearFlag_CC4(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM);
254 LL_TIM_SetCounter(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, 0);
255 furi_hal_rfid->read_capture_callback(
256 false, LL_TIM_IC_GetCaptureCH4(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM), furi_hal_rfid->context);
257 }
258}
259
260void furi_hal_rfid_tim_read_capture_start(FuriHalRfidReadCaptureCallback callback, void* context) {
261 furi_assert(furi_hal_rfid);
262
263 furi_hal_rfid->read_capture_callback = callback;
264 furi_hal_rfid->context = context;
265
266 furi_hal_bus_enable(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM_BUS);
267
268 // Timer: base
269 LL_TIM_InitTypeDef TIM_InitStruct = {0};
270 TIM_InitStruct.Prescaler = 64 - 1;
271 TIM_InitStruct.CounterMode = LL_TIM_COUNTERMODE_UP;
272 TIM_InitStruct.Autoreload = UINT32_MAX;
273 TIM_InitStruct.ClockDivision = LL_TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV1;
274 LL_TIM_Init(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, &TIM_InitStruct);
275
276 // Timer: advanced
277 LL_TIM_SetClockSource(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, LL_TIM_CLOCKSOURCE_INTERNAL);
278 LL_TIM_DisableARRPreload(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM);
279 LL_TIM_SetTriggerInput(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, LL_TIM_TS_TI2FP2);
280 LL_TIM_SetSlaveMode(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, LL_TIM_SLAVEMODE_DISABLED);
281 LL_TIM_SetTriggerOutput(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, LL_TIM_TRGO_RESET);
282 LL_TIM_EnableMasterSlaveMode(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM);
283 LL_TIM_DisableDMAReq_TRIG(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM);
284 LL_TIM_DisableIT_TRIG(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM);
285 LL_TIM_SetRemap(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, LL_TIM_TIM2_TI4_RMP_COMP1);
286
287 // Timer: channel 3 indirect
288 LL_TIM_IC_SetActiveInput(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_IND_CH, LL_TIM_ACTIVEINPUT_INDIRECTTI);
289 LL_TIM_IC_SetPrescaler(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_IND_CH, LL_TIM_ICPSC_DIV1);
290 LL_TIM_IC_SetPolarity(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_IND_CH, LL_TIM_IC_POLARITY_FALLING);
291 LL_TIM_IC_SetFilter(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_IND_CH, LL_TIM_IC_FILTER_FDIV1);
292
293 // Timer: channel 4 direct
294 LL_TIM_IC_SetActiveInput(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_DIR_CH, LL_TIM_ACTIVEINPUT_DIRECTTI);
295 LL_TIM_IC_SetPrescaler(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_DIR_CH, LL_TIM_ICPSC_DIV1);
296 LL_TIM_IC_SetPolarity(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_DIR_CH, LL_TIM_IC_POLARITY_RISING);
297 LL_TIM_IC_SetFilter(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_DIR_CH, LL_TIM_IC_FILTER_FDIV1);
298
299 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER_IRQ, furi_hal_capture_dma_isr, NULL);
300
301 LL_TIM_EnableIT_CC3(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM);
302 LL_TIM_EnableIT_CC4(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM);
303 LL_TIM_CC_EnableChannel(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_IND_CH);
304 LL_TIM_CC_EnableChannel(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, RFID_CAPTURE_DIR_CH);
305 LL_TIM_SetCounter(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM, 0);
306 LL_TIM_EnableCounter(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM);
307
308 furi_hal_rfid_comp_start();
309}
310
311void furi_hal_rfid_tim_read_capture_stop() {
312 furi_hal_rfid_comp_stop();
313
314 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER_IRQ, NULL, NULL);
315 furi_hal_bus_disable(RFID_CAPTURE_TIM_BUS);
316}
317
318static void furi_hal_rfid_dma_isr() {
319#if RFID_DMA_CH1_CHANNEL == LL_DMA_CHANNEL_1
320 if(LL_DMA_IsActiveFlag_HT1(RFID_DMA)) {
321 LL_DMA_ClearFlag_HT1(RFID_DMA);
322 furi_hal_rfid->dma_callback(true, furi_hal_rfid->context);
323 }
324
325 if(LL_DMA_IsActiveFlag_TC1(RFID_DMA)) {
326 LL_DMA_ClearFlag_TC1(RFID_DMA);
327 furi_hal_rfid->dma_callback(false, furi_hal_rfid->context);
328 }
329#else
330#error Update this code. Would you kindly?
331#endif
332}
333
334void furi_hal_rfid_tim_emulate_dma_start(
335 uint32_t* duration,
336 uint32_t* pulse,
337 size_t length,
338 FuriHalRfidDMACallback callback,
339 void* context) {
340 furi_assert(furi_hal_rfid);
341
342 // setup interrupts
343 furi_hal_rfid->dma_callback = callback;
344 furi_hal_rfid->context = context;
345
346 // setup pins
347 furi_hal_rfid_pins_emulate();
348
349 // configure timer
350 furi_hal_bus_enable(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER_BUS);
351 furi_hal_rfid_tim_emulate();
352 LL_TIM_OC_SetPolarity(
353 FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER, FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER_CHANNEL, LL_TIM_OCPOLARITY_HIGH);
354 LL_TIM_EnableDMAReq_UPDATE(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER);
355
356 // configure DMA "mem -> ARR" channel
357 LL_DMA_InitTypeDef dma_config = {0};
358 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcAddress = (uint32_t) & (FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER->ARR);
359 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstAddress = (uint32_t)duration;
360 dma_config.Direction = LL_DMA_DIRECTION_MEMORY_TO_PERIPH;
361 dma_config.Mode = LL_DMA_MODE_CIRCULAR;
362 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcIncMode = LL_DMA_PERIPH_NOINCREMENT;
363 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstIncMode = LL_DMA_MEMORY_INCREMENT;
364 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcDataSize = LL_DMA_PDATAALIGN_WORD;
365 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstDataSize = LL_DMA_MDATAALIGN_WORD;
366 dma_config.NbData = length;
367 dma_config.PeriphRequest = LL_DMAMUX_REQ_TIM2_UP;
368 dma_config.Priority = LL_DMA_MODE_NORMAL;
369 LL_DMA_Init(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF, &dma_config);
370 LL_DMA_EnableChannel(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF);
371
372 // configure DMA "mem -> CCR3" channel
373#if FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER_CHANNEL == LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH3
374 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcAddress = (uint32_t) & (FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER->CCR3);
375#else
376#error Update this code. Would you kindly?
377#endif
378 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstAddress = (uint32_t)pulse;
379 dma_config.Direction = LL_DMA_DIRECTION_MEMORY_TO_PERIPH;
380 dma_config.Mode = LL_DMA_MODE_CIRCULAR;
381 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcIncMode = LL_DMA_PERIPH_NOINCREMENT;
382 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstIncMode = LL_DMA_MEMORY_INCREMENT;
383 dma_config.PeriphOrM2MSrcDataSize = LL_DMA_PDATAALIGN_WORD;
384 dma_config.MemoryOrM2MDstDataSize = LL_DMA_MDATAALIGN_WORD;
385 dma_config.NbData = length;
386 dma_config.PeriphRequest = LL_DMAMUX_REQ_TIM2_UP;
387 dma_config.Priority = LL_DMA_MODE_NORMAL;
388 LL_DMA_Init(RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF, &dma_config);
389 LL_DMA_EnableChannel(RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF);
390
391 // attach interrupt to one of DMA channels
392 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(RFID_DMA_CH1_IRQ, furi_hal_rfid_dma_isr, NULL);
393 LL_DMA_EnableIT_TC(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF);
394 LL_DMA_EnableIT_HT(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF);
395
396 // start
397 LL_TIM_EnableAllOutputs(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER);
398
399 LL_TIM_SetCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER, 0);
400 LL_TIM_EnableCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER);
401}
402
403void furi_hal_rfid_tim_emulate_dma_stop() {
404 LL_TIM_DisableCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER);
405 LL_TIM_DisableAllOutputs(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER);
406
407 furi_hal_interrupt_set_isr(RFID_DMA_CH1_IRQ, NULL, NULL);
408 LL_DMA_DisableIT_TC(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF);
409 LL_DMA_DisableIT_HT(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF);
410
411 FURI_CRITICAL_ENTER();
412
413 LL_DMA_DeInit(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF);
414 LL_DMA_DeInit(RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF);
415
416 furi_hal_bus_disable(FURI_HAL_RFID_EMULATE_TIMER_BUS);
417
418 FURI_CRITICAL_EXIT();
419}
420
421void furi_hal_rfid_set_read_period(uint32_t period) {
422 LL_TIM_SetAutoReload(FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER, period);
423}
424
425void furi_hal_rfid_set_read_pulse(uint32_t pulse) {
426#if FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER_CHANNEL == LL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1N
427 LL_TIM_OC_SetCompareCH1(FURI_HAL_RFID_READ_TIMER, pulse);
428#else
429#error Update this code. Would you kindly?
430#endif
431}
432
433void furi_hal_rfid_comp_start() {
434 LL_COMP_Enable(COMP1);
435 // Magic
436 uint32_t wait_loop_index = ((80 / 10UL) * ((SystemCoreClock / (100000UL * 2UL)) + 1UL));
437 while(wait_loop_index) {
438 wait_loop_index--;
439 }
440}
441
442void furi_hal_rfid_comp_stop() {
443 LL_COMP_Disable(COMP1);
444}
445
446FuriHalRfidCompCallback furi_hal_rfid_comp_callback = NULL;
447void* furi_hal_rfid_comp_callback_context = NULL;
448
449void furi_hal_rfid_comp_set_callback(FuriHalRfidCompCallback callback, void* context) {
450 FURI_CRITICAL_ENTER();
451 furi_hal_rfid_comp_callback = callback;
452 furi_hal_rfid_comp_callback_context = context;
453 __DMB();
454 FURI_CRITICAL_EXIT();
455}
456
457/* Comparator trigger event */
458void COMP_IRQHandler() {
459 if(LL_EXTI_IsActiveFlag_0_31(LL_EXTI_LINE_20)) {
460 LL_EXTI_ClearFlag_0_31(LL_EXTI_LINE_20);
461 }
462 if(furi_hal_rfid_comp_callback) {
463 furi_hal_rfid_comp_callback(
464 (LL_COMP_ReadOutputLevel(COMP1) == LL_COMP_OUTPUT_LEVEL_LOW),
465 furi_hal_rfid_comp_callback_context);
466 }
467}
468
469static void furi_hal_rfid_field_tim_setup() {
470 // setup timer counter
471 furi_hal_bus_enable(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER_BUS);
472
473 LL_TIM_SetPrescaler(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER, 0);
474 LL_TIM_SetCounterMode(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER, LL_TIM_COUNTERMODE_UP);
475 LL_TIM_SetAutoReload(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER, 0xFFFFFFFF);
476 LL_TIM_DisableARRPreload(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER);
477 LL_TIM_SetRepetitionCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER, 0);
478
479 LL_TIM_SetClockDivision(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER, LL_TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV1);
480 LL_TIM_SetClockSource(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER, LL_TIM_CLOCKSOURCE_EXT_MODE2);
481 LL_TIM_ConfigETR(
482 FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER,
483 LL_TIM_ETR_POLARITY_INVERTED,
484 LL_TIM_ETR_PRESCALER_DIV1,
485 LL_TIM_ETR_FILTER_FDIV1);
486
487 LL_TIM_OC_InitTypeDef TIM_OC_InitStruct = {0};
488 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCMode = LL_TIM_OCMODE_PWM1;
489 TIM_OC_InitStruct.OCState = LL_TIM_OCSTATE_ENABLE;
490 TIM_OC_InitStruct.CompareValue = 1;
491 LL_TIM_OC_Init(
492 FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER,
493 FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER_CHANNEL,
494 &TIM_OC_InitStruct);
495
496 LL_TIM_GenerateEvent_UPDATE(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER);
497 LL_TIM_OC_SetPolarity(
498 FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER,
499 FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER_CHANNEL,
500 LL_TIM_OCPOLARITY_HIGH);
501 LL_TIM_EnableDMAReq_UPDATE(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER);
502
503 // setup timer timeouts dma
504 furi_hal_bus_enable(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER_BUS);
505
506 LL_TIM_SetPrescaler(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER, 64000 - 1);
507 LL_TIM_SetCounterMode(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER, LL_TIM_COUNTERMODE_UP);
508 LL_TIM_SetAutoReload(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER, 100 - 1); // 100 ms
509 LL_TIM_SetClockDivision(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER, LL_TIM_CLOCKDIVISION_DIV1);
510 LL_TIM_SetClockSource(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER, LL_TIM_CLOCKSOURCE_INTERNAL);
511
512 LL_TIM_DisableARRPreload(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER);
513
514 LL_TIM_EnableDMAReq_UPDATE(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER);
515 LL_TIM_GenerateEvent_UPDATE(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER);
516}
517
518void furi_hal_rfid_field_detect_start(void) {
519 // setup pins
520 furi_hal_rfid_pins_field();
521
522 // configure timer
523 furi_hal_rfid_field_tim_setup();
524
525 // configure DMA "TIM_COUNTER_CNT -> counter"
526 LL_DMA_SetMemoryAddress(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF, (uint32_t) & (furi_hal_rfid->field.counter));
527 LL_DMA_SetPeriphAddress(
528 RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF, (uint32_t) & (FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER->CNT));
529 LL_DMA_ConfigTransfer(
530 RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF,
531 LL_DMA_DIRECTION_PERIPH_TO_MEMORY | LL_DMA_MODE_CIRCULAR | LL_DMA_PERIPH_NOINCREMENT |
532 LL_DMA_MEMORY_NOINCREMENT | LL_DMA_PDATAALIGN_WORD | LL_DMA_MDATAALIGN_WORD |
533 LL_DMA_PRIORITY_MEDIUM);
534 LL_DMA_SetDataLength(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF, 1);
535 LL_DMA_SetPeriphRequest(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF, FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_DMAMUX_DMA);
536 LL_DMA_EnableChannel(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF);
537
538 // configure DMA "mem -> TIM_COUNTER_CNT"
539 LL_DMA_SetMemoryAddress(
540 RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF, (uint32_t) & (furi_hal_rfid->field.set_tim_counter_cnt));
541 LL_DMA_SetPeriphAddress(
542 RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF, (uint32_t) & (FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER->CNT));
543 LL_DMA_ConfigTransfer(
544 RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF,
545 LL_DMA_DIRECTION_MEMORY_TO_PERIPH | LL_DMA_MODE_CIRCULAR | LL_DMA_PERIPH_NOINCREMENT |
546 LL_DMA_MEMORY_NOINCREMENT | LL_DMA_PDATAALIGN_WORD | LL_DMA_MDATAALIGN_WORD |
547 LL_DMA_PRIORITY_LOW);
548 LL_DMA_SetDataLength(RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF, 1);
549 LL_DMA_SetPeriphRequest(RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF, FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_DMAMUX_DMA);
550 LL_DMA_EnableChannel(RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF);
551
552 // start tim counter
553 LL_TIM_EnableAllOutputs(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER);
554
555 LL_TIM_SetCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER, 0);
556 LL_TIM_EnableCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER);
557
558 // start tim timeout
559 LL_TIM_SetCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER, 0);
560 LL_TIM_EnableCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER);
561 LL_TIM_EnableIT_UPDATE(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER);
562}
563
564void furi_hal_rfid_field_detect_stop(void) {
565 LL_TIM_DisableCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER);
566 LL_TIM_DisableAllOutputs(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER);
567
568 LL_TIM_DisableCounter(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER);
569
570 FURI_CRITICAL_ENTER();
571
572 LL_DMA_DeInit(RFID_DMA_CH1_DEF);
573 LL_DMA_DeInit(RFID_DMA_CH2_DEF);
574
575 furi_hal_bus_disable(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_COUNTER_TIMER_BUS);
576 furi_hal_bus_disable(FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_TIMEOUT_TIMER_BUS);
577
578 furi_hal_rfid_pins_reset();
579
580 FURI_CRITICAL_EXIT();
581}
582
583bool furi_hal_rfid_field_is_present(uint32_t* frequency) {
584 *frequency = furi_hal_rfid->field.counter * 10;
585 return (
586 (*frequency >= FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_FREQUENCY_MIN) &&
587 (*frequency <= FURI_HAL_RFID_FIELD_FREQUENCY_MAX));
588}
